text: Rohit Shetty is an Indian movie director. He has created a number of movies like the Golmaal films, Singham, and more. His most successful movie has been Chennai Express. ==Personal life== He was born to Ratna Shetty, a Bollywood junior artiste, and M. B. Shetty. He has four siblings. ==References== Category:Indian movie directors Category:Living people Category:1973 births Category:Comedy movie series navigational boxes Category:Indian movie producers Category:People from Mumbai
title: Rohit Shetty
